meanings.definition: Impossible to see or perceive clearly.
meanings.sent1: The tiny text on the sign was indiscernible from far away.
meanings.sent2: The fog made the outline of the mountain indiscernible.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick was to make objects indiscernible to the audience.
meanings.sent4: The truth was hidden in an indiscernible web of lies.
meanings.sent5: The ghostly figure was indiscernible in the darkness of the night.

meanings.definition: Not able to be distinguished or recognized.
meanings.sent1: The identical twins were indiscernible from each other in the photo.
meanings.sent2: The distant figure was indiscernible in the thick mist.
meanings.sent3: The secret agent's disguise made him indiscernible in the crowd.
meanings.sent4: The subtle differences in the paintings were indiscernible to the untrained eye.
meanings.sent5: The hidden message in the code was indiscernible without the key.
